snippet: The children’s mother was found at the home in East Haven, Conn., with arm injuries that were not life-threatening; the police were treating the deaths as suspicious.
abstract: Police and firefighters find two children dead in home filled with natural gas in East Haven, Conn; believe gas was deliberately turned on and consider deaths suspicious; mother, who was also found in house, has not yet been questioned.
lead_paragraph: The children’s mother was found at the home in East Haven, Conn., with arm injuries that were not life-threatening; the police were treating the deaths as suspicious.

headline.main: 2 Children Are Found Dead in Connecticut Home Filled With Gas
headline.print_headline: 2 Children Are Found Dead in Home Filled With Gas
